text: Toby Alex Kodat (born 13 January 2003) is an American junior tennis player. Kodat has a career high ATP singles ranking of 1789 achieved on 12 August 2019. On the junior tour, he has a career high junior ranking of 7, achieved on 29 July 2019. In August 2019, Kodat and his partner Martin Damm won the USTA Boys 18s National Championships doubles title, earning the pair a wild- card entry into the doubles main draw of the 2019 US Open. Kodat is the half- brother of former tennis player Nicole Vaidišová. ==Junior Grand Slam finals== ===Boys' Singles=== {|class="sortable wikitable" style=font-size:97% !Outcome !Year !Championship !Surface !Opponent !Score |- style="background:#ebc2af;" | style="background:#ffa07a;"|Loss |2019 |French Open |Clay | Holger Vitus Nødskov Rune |3–6, 7–6(7–5), 0–6 |} ==References== ==External links== * * Category:2003 births Category:Living people Category:American male tennis players Category:Sportspeople from Bradenton, Florida Category:American people of Czech descent Category:Tennis people from Florida
title: Toby Kodat
